title: Sri Lanka increases VAT to 12% & Telecommunication Levy to 15%
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Value Added Tax has been increased from 8% to 12% with immediate effect, announced the Office of the Prime Minister on Tuesday (31).
In addition, the Telecommunication Levy was increased from 11.25% to 15% with immediate effect, said a statement.
